snippet: Creflo Dollar, a megachurch pastor and television evangelist, was arrested early Friday after slightly injuring his 15-year-old daughter in a fight at his home near Atlanta, authorities said.
abstract: Creflo Dollar, a megachurch pastor and television evangelist, is arrested after slightly injuring his 15-year-old daughter in a fight at his home near Atlanta.
lead_paragraph: Creflo Dollar, a megachurch pastor and television evangelist, was arrested early Friday after slightly injuring his 15-year-old daughter in a fight at his home near Atlanta, authorities said.

headline.seo: Georgia: Pastor Arrested in Domestic Incident
